My view on relationships has evolved in the recent years. This means that sometimes all the love in the world cannot save it, and just as easily as you accept love into your life, it can easily fly away from you. Loving someone means being there for them, sharing and learning from each other, as well as letting them go when they need you to.

It is extremely hard to find a stable, kind, and open-minded person with whom you can form a true connection with, but not impossible.
